job.title: Atlassian Administrator
job.description:
A bit about us:
By bringing together next-gen technology and the finest live data available, Genius Sports is enabling a new era of sports for fans worldwide, delivering experiences that are more immersive, interactive and personalised than ever before. Learn more at geniussports.com.
THE ROLE:
Genius Sports is a longstanding user of the Atlassian tooling. Like most companies, we have accrued some overlap in our internal tooling and we’re looking to streamline this across teams by importing data and migrating teams over to the Atlassian stack. Genius Sports is looking for a passionate Atlassian administrator to help us with achieving our goal of driving adoption of Jira and Confluence further within the business so we can end up with a unified stack for documentation and work management.

What you'll do:
Monitor responsible usage of the Jira & Confluence systems and maintain configuration and workflows
Monitor upcoming changes and feature releases for tools in scope
Support adoption of Atlassian tooling when migration is being done
Work with the IT team on reviewing requests or suggestions, assess their impact and value, and prioritise appropriately
Understand usage and plan migrations between ITSM and documentation tooling
Write scripts and API calls as needed to automate migration processes
In conjunction with the IT and business teams, plan appropriate migration paths to ensure usability and feature parity
Script API calls to facilitate the migration into from Jira and Confluence from other tooling - Notion, Linear, other Jira instances

What you'll bring:
Work experience in a similar position where maintenance of Atlassian tooling and migration to Atlassian tools was required
Extensive Atlassian experience - Jira and Confluence and their respective API’s
Experience in migrating/merging Jira instances and migrating data into Jira and Confluence cloud
Understanding of the agile workflow and requirements
Understanding of permissions structure in Atlassian tooling
Ability to quickly learn and adapt
Solid verbal and written communication skills (English), including the ability to communicate complex issues to both technical and non-technical stakeholders

Why join?:
We enjoy an office-first culture and maximize opportunities to collaborate, connect and learn together. Our hybrid working models differ depending on your role and location.
As well as a competitive salary and range of benefits, were committed to supporting employee wellbeing and helping you grow your skills, experience and career. Learn more about how rewarding life at Genius can be at Reward | Genius Sports.
One team, being brave, driving change
We strive to create an
inclusive working environment, where everyone feels a sense of belonging and
the ability to make a difference. Learn more about our values and culture at Culture | Genius
.
